title: Why I got banned
body: I was played the akali for the last game before when I get the summer vacation. that was 5/16/2019. I didn't play games on 8/11/2019. I thought someone hacking my account and played the game. I'm unfair. I just want to play with my account. Please help me.

replies.body: Send a ticket to support requesting investigation, there have been a lot of these banned stolen accounts lately, and they are often unbanned and returned when the original owner shows up and provides verification.
